comments.content: Ahhhhh... how I adore Cafe Flora! Haven't been in several months but I'm REALLY loving this "peek behind the scenes" from my favorite neighborhood veg. friendly restaurant! Keep it up!

comments.author: Madelyn
comments.content:
Michael,

I applaud you.  You are very courageous.

I am struggling with very similar issues about making a career change and you have given me some inspiration.

I have started letting my culinary creative juices flow via my blog http://karmafreecooking.wordpress.com.

Hopefully I'll get the courage, as you did, to take a leave of absence and try it out.  There's interest in vegetarianism in Puerto Rico and a true need for education and catering/dining alternatives.

Let's see what the future holds for both of us.

Exito!!!!
